### Supply and Transport of Potable Water
#### Request for Standing Offer
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking offers from suitable suppliers to provide potable water delivery services to various locations in Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax.

#### Key Details

* **Procurement Reference Number:** WS3732299233-Doc3829734142
* **Publication Date:** January 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 1, 2023 at 2:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 1, 2023

#### Background
This Request for Standing Offer (RfSO) is part of the PSPC's efforts to provide potable water delivery services to CFB Halifax on an as-required basis. The services are limited to Canadian suppliers.

#### Scope
The selected supplier will be required to deliver potable water to various locations within CFB Halifax on an as-requested basis.

#### Evaluation Criteria

* **_lowest price_

#### Requirements and Deliverables

* Suppliers mus provide a clear and concise financial proposal, including detailed pricing for the services.
* Suppliers must demonstrate their ability to provide potable water delivery services to various locations on an as-required basis.

#### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: February 1, 2023 at 2:00 PM
* Expected Contract Start Date: March 1, 2023

#### Contact Information

Matthew Furlong, Procurement Specialist, PSPC
[matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Additional Information

More details on this procurement can be found on the Ariba Website: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15141827](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15141827). Interested suppliers are encouraged to review this website for further information and to submit their proposals.
